title: Meta-Reflection Workflow
description: A recursive self-assessment process for AI systems or educators to evaluate their own learning frameworks.

phases.title: Awareness and Observation
tasks: Collect system outputs or learner artifacts
Identify recurring patterns of success or error
Document areas of cognitive or procedural bias

phases.title: Interpretation and Reconciliation
tasks: Map observed trends to underlying causes
Cross-compare current strategies with intended design goals
Redefine or merge overlapping conceptual structures

phases.title: Evolution and Reconfiguration
tasks: Regenerate improved frameworks using recursive synthesis
Archive obsolete models with annotation of lessons learned
Validate new models through internal feedback or peer testing
